data.actual_result: The greater your screen pixel density is, the blurrier are all profile pictures. It doesn't happen everywhere: it happens in chat, in VC user list, and in member list, but not in profile, in message actionsheets or in quick switcher for example
data.expected_result: Quality should be sharp and nice
data.short_description: On devices with a screen pixel density grater than 430 DPI, profile pictures are blurrier than in Alpha 7.8.2
data.steps_to_repro: - Look at profile pictures in chat, in voice channel user list, or in server member list - Compare quality of profile pictures with previous version of Discord
